item.description:
FREE CONCERT - Show starts @ 8:30 pm @ Lighthouse Bar
Batteries Not Included, featuring Nick Pedro of American Idol fame, plays songs from the hitmakers of the past 6 decades including Maroon 5, John Mayer, Bon Jovi, Jimmy Eat World, Justin Timberlake, Stevie Wonder, O.A.R., Gavin DeGraw, Michael Jackson, Semisonic, Jason Mraz, The Black Crowes, Bryan Adams, Kid Rock, One Republic, Neil Diamond, The Killers, Duran Duran, Billy Idol, Free, Billy Joel, Elton John, The Contours, and many more! Meet at the Lighthouse Bar (tables and chairs located in front of the stage). Show starts at 8:30 pm, come early for best seating. Whether you like to listen to music & enjoy the show and/or dance, dance, dance, this will be a FUN night. Go earlier and try your luck at the slot machines!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet @ table/chair area of Lighthouse Bar inside Twin Rivers!
item.name: BATTERIES NOT INCLUDED!
